fixes.name: Executive Score
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Final Performnace Label] = "Excellent", 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Weighted Score] + 2, 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Weighted Score])
fixes.solution_explanation: Direct row-level translation: Tableau IF mapped to DAX IF and all column references converted to 'Table'[Column] format. No aggregations or parameters are used, so this is a calculated column.
